content: this legal text discusses a court case involving the division of an inherited estate the parties involved are identified as lo ni ag ro lo ca fr lo ca st lo ca ro and lo ca pr the plaintiff claims that the estate consists of various properties and assets the courtappointed expert witness filed a division plan which was partially modified by the judge the court determines that the estate should be divided proportionally among the coowners taking into account the qualitative and quantitative aspects of the assets unequal portions may be allocated by drawing lots the court assigns specific shares to the parties and orders the remaining portions to be determined by drawing lots the final judgment can be appealed but the allocation of assets will proceed regardless the costs of the proceedings and the courtappointed experts report will be shared by the parties the court also addresses a counterclaim regarding payment of an indemnity for the exclusive use of certain properties which is dismissed the court calculates the occupation indemnity due to one party and deducts it from the expenses incurred by the other parties the court orders the payment of certain expenses and determines the final division of assets the case is remitted for further investigation and preparation of the necessary cadastral division the courts decision was made on january 19 2018 in monza
